Description:
1 x IN Issued - Serial Number IN / SDR221221/01  (312140133) - you have failed to designate as classified persons those employees who are likely to receive an effective dose greater than 6 mSv per year or an equivalent dose greater than 15 mSv per year for the lens of the eye or greater than 150 mSv per year for the skin or the extremities and must immediately inform those employees that they have been so designated. 

1 x IN Issued - Serial Number IN / SDR/221221/02 (312139952) - You have failed to provide your appointed radiation protection supervisors with appropriate training in the field of radiation protection and such information and instruction as is suitable and sufficient to carry out this role. .
